template.docs:
The `template` alarm control panel platform allows you to turn your binary sensors into a state machine managed alarm control panel.

*See also: [Template Alarm Control Panel](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/template.html#template-alarm-control-panel)*

id.docs:
**string**: Manually specify the ID for code generation. At least one of **id** and **name** must be specified.

*See also: [Alarm Control Panel Component](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#base-alarm-control-panel-configuration)*

on_state.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the alarm changes state. See [on_state Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#alarm-control-panel-on-state-trigger).

*See also: [Alarm Control Panel Component](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#base-alarm-control-panel-configuration)*

on_triggered.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the alarm triggers. See [on_triggered Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#alarm-control-panel-on-triggered-trigger).

*See also: [Alarm Control Panel Component](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#base-alarm-control-panel-configuration)*

on_arming.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the alarm state changes to `arming`. See [on_arming Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#alarm-control-panel-on-arming-trigger).

*See also: [Alarm Control Panel Component](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#base-alarm-control-panel-configuration)*

*See also: [Alarm Control Panel Component](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#base-alarm-control-panel-configuration)*

on_chime.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when a zone has been marked as chime in the configuration, and it changes from closed to open. See [on_chime Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#alarm-control-panel-on-chime-trigger).

*See also: [Alarm Control Panel Component](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#base-alarm-control-panel-configuration)*

on_ready.docs:
**[Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action)**: An automation to perform when the logical ‘and’ of all the zone sensors change state. See [on_ready Trigger](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#alarm-control-panel-on-ready-trigger).

*See also: [Alarm Control Panel Component](https://esphome.io/components/alarm_control_panel/index.html#base-alarm-control-panel-configuration)*
